I have been playing this game for a while now and was sceptical at the start... After playing it for over 100 hours I can definatly say it's worth it.  While the comunity can become a bit overwelming the game itself is fun and leaves room for practice and improvements. Multiple custom maps are made which offer new and fun experiences for all.  You feel roped into the market and want to buy a new skin whenever you see one in game. Overall it's just a fun game that true gamers will enjoy for hours!
